title: cristal - English translation – Linguee
description: Many translated example sentences containing "cristal" – English-Spanish dictionary and search engine for English translations.
text:
▾Dictionary Spanish-English
[de cristal](/spanish-english/translation/de+cristal.html) adverb—
Examples:
[paredes de cristal](/spanish-english/translation/paredes+de+cristal.html) pl f— [paneles de cristal](/spanish-english/translation/paneles+de+cristal.html) pl m— [muros de cristal](/spanish-english/translation/muros+de+cristal.html) pl m—
